title: The normal permissible tenement density per net hectare may be allowed to be exceeded in multiple of F
clause_text: The normal permissible tenement density per net hectare may be allowed to be exceeded in multiple of F.S.I. permissible.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
